炧字的基本解释

炧
xiè
古同“灺”，残烛：“古殿香残炧。”

炧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiè］
［《廣韻》徐野切，上馬，邪。］
亦作“炧1”。亦作“炨1”。
(1)灯烛余烬。
(2)指灯烛。
(3)指灯烛光。
(4)泛指余烬。
(5)指灯烛、香火熄灭。
(6)引申指毁灭。

炧字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　炧； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页668第15
【集韻】待可切，音舵。燭餘也。同灺。詳灺字註。

炧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
炧字的起名意思

暂无。

炧
Basic explanation of words
炧
xiè
Gu Tong "灺", Can Zhu: "Ancient temple incense remains."
炧
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiè］
["Guangyun" Xu Ye cuts, mounts, evil. ]
Also known as "炧1". Also known as "炨1".
(1) Lamp candle embers.
(2) Refers to light candles.
(3) Refers to lamp candlelight.
(4) Refers to embers in general.
(5) Means that the candles and incense are extinguished.
(6) The extension refers to destruction.
炧
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　炧; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 668 15
[Jiyun] Wait to be cut, tone rudder. More than a candle. Tong Hao. Detailed note of the word.
炧
